Published November 2 2014

New Google Calendar app

New Google Calendar app — I’ve been incredibly impressed with Google’s Material design spec and execution. All their apps are beginning to have a cohesive feeling, across both mobile and desktop devices. I still prefer the iOS aesthetic, as I feel it’s more flexible for iOS designers to be creative, but we’re reaching that point where Google is making better designs faster than Apple is web services.

Enjoy your day.
